mapper.select: SELECT g.id as good_id, w.wh_id, w.wh_name, g.g_code, g.g_name, g.py_code, g.specification, g.type AS type_id, t.gt_name AS type, g.model, g.weight, g.color, g.unit AS unit_id, u.gu_name AS unit, g.allocation, g.manufacturer, g.bar_code, g.qr_code, SUM(i.count) AS count, SUM(wg.lower_limit) AS lower_limit, SUM(wg.upper_limit) AS upper_limit FROM tb_wh_inventory i LEFT JOIN tb_goods_info g ON g.id = i.good_id LEFT JOIN tb_goods_type t ON t.id = g.type LEFT JOIN tb_goods_unit u ON u.id = g.unit LEFT JOIN tb_warehouse w ON w.wh_id = i.wh_id LEFT JOIN tb_wh_goods wg ON wg.wh_id = i.wh_id AND wg.good_id = i.good_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT g.id as good_id, '' as wh_id, '全部仓库' as wh_name, g.g_code, g.g_name, g.py_code, g.specification, g.type AS type_id, t.gt_name AS type, g.model, g.weight, g.color, g.unit AS unit_id, u.gu_name AS unit, g.allocation, g.manufacturer, g.bar_code, g.qr_code, SUM(i.count) AS count, SUM(wg.lower_limit) AS lower_limit, SUM(wg.upper_limit) AS upper_limit FROM tb_wh_inventory i LEFT JOIN tb_goods_info g ON g.id = i.good_id LEFT JOIN tb_goods_type t ON t.id = g.type LEFT JOIN tb_goods_unit u ON u.id = g.unit LEFT JOIN tb_wh_goods wg ON wg.wh_id = i.wh_id AND wg.good_id = i.good_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT o.order_no, o.in_out_type, o.order_type, g.g_code, g.g_name, g.specification, g.py_code, u.gu_name AS unitName, og.price, (CASE WHEN og.pl_good_num IS NOT NULL THEN og.pl_good_num ELSE og.good_num END) AS count, (CASE WHEN og.pl_price IS NOT NULL THEN og.pl_price ELSE og.total_price END) AS total_price, w.wh_name, (CASE WHEN c.c_name IS NOT NULL THEN c.c_name ELSE (CASE WHEN d.name IS NOT NULL THEN d.name ELSE sw.wh_name END) END) AS source FROM tb_orders o LEFT JOIN tb_order_goods og ON og.order_id = o.id LEFT JOIN tb_goods_info g ON g.id = og.good_id LEFT JOIN tb_goods_unit u ON u.id = g.unit LEFT JOIN tb_warehouse w ON w.wh_id = o.wh_id LEFT JOIN tb_warehouse sw ON sw.wh_id = o.source_id LEFT JOIN tb_partner_company_info c ON c.id = o.source_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON d.dept_id = o.source_id WHERE g.id = #{goodId} AND o.status = 2
AND (o.wh_id = #{whId} OR o.source_id = #{whId})
ORDER BY o.order_date DESC
